callback_message:
1. Check app version is v13.11.0+
2. Configure coupons with the same Coupon Name as Woocommerce
description:
# Coupon Support
Go to Help -> About and check that the Frappe and ERPNext versions are after v13.11.0 for compatible Pricing Rule support for Woocommerce discount coupons. Support at time of writing is only for transaction-based Pricing Rules, not per-Item.

ERPNext Sales Orders only support one coupon code:
 - the first Woocommerce `coupon_lines` `code` field must match the ERPNext `Coupon Code` `name` field

[**View PR**](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/pull/27423)
name: Setup Coupon Codes
title: Setup Coupon Codes
